marketing_description: The Classic Smart Saver plan offers extensive hospital cover with a unique savings structure. It combines unlimited private hospital cover (200% rate) with a Medical Savings Account for day-to-day expenses.

notes: Premiums include Medical Savings Account portion.
We pay up to twice the Discovery Health Rate (200%) for healthcare professionals in hospital.
Day-to-day cover for GPs is unlimited in Smart network (R75 co-payment).

procedures.notes: Must be done in Smart Day Surgery Network. If done out of network, R12,650 upfront payment applies.
Must be done in Smart Day Surgery Network. If done out of network, R12,650 upfront payment applies.
Upfront payment of R8,950 for hospital admissions (13+ years). R5,750 for day clinic admissions. Severe dental/oral surgery covered from Hospital Benefit.

modules.title: Personal Health Fund
modules.description: Accumulate up to R10,000 per family for additional day-to-day cover.

data.mechanism: Health checks and physical activity goals unlock funds.

modules.title: Screening and Prevention
modules.description: Cover for screening tests like mammograms, pap smears, and prostate screening.

modules.title: Medical Savings Account
modules.description: 16% of your premium goes to a savings account for day-to-day expenses.
